PHRASE.LANG: Rewarded for free to gifters generous enough to reach Karma level 10 in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]

Offert gratuitement aux donneurs de cadeaux suffisamment généreux pour atteindre le niveau 10 de Karma dans le Giftinator 9000 de Hellfire Games. L'amplificateur de vitesse est enclenché quand l'avatar se déplace à sa vitesse maximale. [#Legal]

Kostenlose Belohnung für großzügige Geschenkgeber, die es bis auf Karma-Level 10 im Geschenkomat 9000 von Hellfire Games schaffen. Der Geschwindigkeitsschub setzt automatisch ein, wenn der Avatar sich mit voller Geschwindigkeit bewegt. [#Legal]

Sei stato premiato gratuitamente da utenti abbastanza generosi da raggiungere il livello 10 di Karma nel Giftinator 9000, Hellfire Games. È possibile incrementarne la velocità portando l'avatar alla sua massima velocità di spostamento. [#Legal]

Recompensado de forma gratuita a los donantes que han sido tan generosos como para alcanzar un Karma de nivel 10 en el Giftinator 9000 de Hellfire Games. El aumento de velocidad se activa cuando el avatar se está moviendo a su máxima velocidad. [#Legal]

Rewarded for free to gifters generous enough to reach Karma level 10 in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]

Rewarded for free to gifters generous enough to reach Karma level 10 in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]
Note to Hellfire Games: Add "The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed" at the end. [#Legal]
